alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 3:54PM CDT until October 30 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 to 50 mph expected. For the Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Otero Mesa. In Texas, Northern Hudspeth Highlands/Hueco Mountains and Southern Hudspeth Highlands. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Monday. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy flurries and freezing fog also possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
